item.title: Good group last night
Got mypowercircle to trigger Travis deploys
item.description: 10:26 Friday 21 July 2017 JST When I git push the source docs for Tokyo Men’s Group to the Github repo for Tokyo Men’s Group, it triggers a Travis build.

item.title: mypowercircle.org
item.description: 21:18 Thursday 20 July 2017 JST I put together https://tokyo.mypowercircle.org/ yesterday or so, and added its calendar this morning.
